QuestData.Title: Nana's Vote III: Witchberry Julep
QuestData.Description: Now that we have the water, I can almost taste the icy cold witchberry julep!$B$BNow, we just need to find ourselves some sweet witchberries.$B$BMy grandson's berries this season have been total slop, so I need to seek a decent harvest elsewhere.$B$BSay, do you have any witchberries in the ground this year? How about you bring me some from your farm?$B$BIf your berries are up to the standard, we'll make ourselves a grand old batch of the old juice!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant and harvest 3 Witchberries, then deliver 15 Witchberries to Nana Mudclaw.$B$BWitchberry Seeds can be purchased from Merchant Greenfield at Halfhill Market. After tilling and tending your plant, you must wait until the next day to harvest ripe Witchberries.
